pr_title: HDDS-4342. Add DataNode state and transitions for a node going through upgrade.

timeline.message: HDDS-4342. Add DataNode state and transitions for a node going through upgrade.

timeline.bodyText:
Is that right we just log an error log here and doesn't take action for the read-only node?
Suppose here we should let these pipelines only allowed to be used for read operations rather than write operations.
timeline.author: linyiqun

replies.bodyText: Yes, because this condition should never happen. Nodes are moved to this state as part of finalizeUpgrade process on SCM. This will be another PR on of this one.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.bodyText: Why cannot we pass the layout version from DN registration to this 'DatanodeInfo' constructor? Instead of initializing with layout version '0'.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: because register may not even be called when the datanode comes up. The very first message from datanode could be directly a heartbeat message.
replies.author: prashantpogde

replies.bodyText: The first request from a DN has to be a registration request. If SCM has lost the in memory state of a Datanode while it was down, then it has to re-register again. In any case, we should be able to use the layout version from the DN's heartbeat/registration payload right?
replies.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: yup. I will upload the changes.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.bodyText: Nit. Should we combine this with the operation in 'updateLastHeartbeatTime'? We are taking a write lock in both the cases and doing minimal work.
timeline.author: avijayanhwx

replies.bodyText: it is doable. The reason I kept layout version info and its handling separate from the rest of the heartbeat processing is because I wanted to play with the idea that later on, we do not need to send layout version to SCM all the time but only when needed.
replies.author: prashantpogde

timeline.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: Can we change the test so that it still verifies the presence of "HealthyNodes" in the SCM eventually?
timeline.author: avijayanhwx
